name: Neon Snake (itch) (meerian)
description:
Basically a snake game with simon says elements and funky colors.

Controls: WASD or Arrow keys to move, space/escape to pause

How to play:

  • Figure out the color pellet to eat
  • Approach each food pellet to know its true colors
  • The faster you eat a pellet, the higher the score

Music Credits:
